channel.title: [Delta] Remaking 'Jag3x' From back in 2008. -NEW-
channel.description:
Hello, this is a remake of an old server I used to love called 'Jag3x'. This server was online for 1 - 2 years and it went down in 2009 and I just started to notice how much I miss it. I'm sure some people who used to play have to still be here. So I'm going to start a new Development of it and try to get some really good coders so I don't need to give up on it. I want this to be a server to last a while. I would like to have atleast 3 server developers(including me) that are active and trustworthy and that understand java on a scale from 5 to 10 or more. I don't want anyone asking me how to do something. If you want to apply and don't know what to do you can use a tutorial I honestly don't care just as long as you understand java and you can do a tutorial and get no errors I'm fine with that.
This server is based in 'Piscartus fishing colony' on runescape. It has no teleports anywhere else on the main land. Monsters are located by talking to an NPC or using portals that teleport you to an island that is not connected to the main land or a dungeon that doesn't allow you on the main land.
This server will be an exact remake and only an exact remake nothing more will be added until its 100% the same than is when I will decide to add more features/items/anything else.
Applications:
Developer: [code] Name: MSN/Skype: Experience: How long have you coded for?: Age: What position would you want In-Game: How dedicated will you be(time played a week/day): What do you specialize in(Server or Client or.. Both): [/code]
Website Developer: [code] Name: Skype/MSN: Experience: Proof of work: Age: How long have you been coding websites: [/code]
Beta-Tester: [code] Name: MSN/Skype: How many hours will you player a day: Age: How smart are you scale 1-10: [/code]
[center][size=24pt]MEDIA![/size]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/if7qko.png[/img]
[size=24pt]Pictures from old server![/size]
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/aosyzm.gif[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/1zgi75.jpg[/img] ^^^80 players vouching for Jag3x^^^ [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/ehm4c7.png[/img] ^^^Drops Dclaws, and all godswords. Mid-high drop rate, not too high!^^^ [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2e1i2xg.gif[/img] ^^^You can turn PvP - On - And - Off -
[b]Features:[/b] [i]Fully working PVP Fully working Mining/Smithing/Thieving KBD that drops Dragon Claws, All the Godswords Fully working Theiving Fully working Woodcutting Fully working Herblore Fully working Firemaking Fully working Agility Working Fletching Mid-hard training in all skills. Randoms, to make sure that you don't bot. GOOD ECONOMY. Alot of shops Working vengeance, working godswords, working dclaw spec, working barrage/all ancients. MINIGAMES such as KBD, Dueling, Pest control[/i]
[size=18pt]Team Members![/size]
[size=14pt]Website Developers![/size] [b]Ice. Profection Runescape Sucks[/b]
[size=14pt]Server Developers![/size] [b]Kill you704 Youridudock[/b]
[size=14pt]Client Developers![/size] [b]In need of client developers![/b]
P.S.: The reason there is no 'Hoster' Application is because I can't trust anyone yet with the files besides for Developers because I know they know what their doing. So for the first month I will be buying the VPS and I will be hosting. This can change if you would want to host but you will have to become close friends with me in a month and prove to me I can trust you.
[/center]

How long have you coded for?: 2 months
Age: 15
What position would you want In-Game: Server Support
How dedicated will you be(time played a week/day): School’s tight, but i can squeeze on a good bit, say atleast 1 hour a day on weekdays playing the server, i have computer classes during the day i can code in. Weekends, I can 4-5 hours.
What do you specialize in(Server or Client or… Both): Server

item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

[quote=“Jack Bower, post:20, topic:420715”]Name: John Brown

MSN/Skype: BuySomeDrugsYo

Experience: I’ve made several bases and servers. I’m currently using Shard Revolution as a base. It’s programmed very well.

How long have you been programming?: Three and 1/2 years.

Age: I’m 19 years old. My D.O.B. is March 3rd, 1992.

What position would you want In-Game: Lead Developer (or Developer).

How dedicated will you be(time played a week/day): I can be on 3 hours every-single-day at the very least.

What do you specialize in(Server or Client or… Both): I’m more proficient in Server-sided programming. I can program both Clients and Servers, but I’m not as good with Clients as I am with Servers.

If you’d like more information, or would like to see some of my work; please don’t hesitate to add my Skype and speak with me. Thank you very much for your time, I hope we can work together in the future.[/quote]
Not accepted.

Read full topic
